title: Textile, "Nippon", A. 1940s  B, C. 1950s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  roller-printed.  Glazed.
dimensions:
H x W x D (a): 32.5 x 22.5 x 1.3 cm (12 13/16 x 8 7/8 x 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 104 x 91.5 cm (40 15/16 x 36 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 104 x 91.5 cm (40 15/16 x 36 in.)
Repeat H (pattern): 52.1 cm (20 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Crane standing beside a zig-zag bridge in a Japanese garden. Monochrome. B is in red, C is in blue. Design source was a photograph taken by Mildred Bradley Hasenclever (the first Mrs. Hasenclever; the donor, a widow, was the second wife), of the Lelita Armour Mitchell Japanese Garden in Pasadena.
